snippet: The Zimbabwe federation said it would appeal after the country was barred from 2018 World Cup qualifying for not paying its former national coach.
abstract: Zimbabwe is barred from 2018 World Cup qualifying over unpaid debt to former national coach Jose Claudinei Georgini; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Zimbabwe federation said it would appeal after the country was barred from 2018 World Cup qualifying for not paying its former national coach.

headline.main: Zimbabwe Is Ousted From World Cup Over a Debt
headline.print_headline: Soccer: Zimbabwe Is Ousted Over a Debt
